name: Hand››over
description:
Need to handover to developers? Tired of trying to figure out what the relative em value would be for your pixels? Well, no longer.


With Hand››over you can:


  • Open the plugin without selections to convert any number to rem
  • Select a node anywhere in your files and open the plugin to see the current pixel value and convert it to rem
  • Change the current selection to update the input value and enable a new conversion
  • Change the baseline px value to whatever you want it to be and see the relevant changes in em conversion
  • Change the scale by which you want to convert based on common scales used


These plugins are free to us, but if you fancy buying me a coffee because it's been useful to you, I'd be grateful: https://ko-fi.com/kemiljk
